data.client_settings: I am using browser client on  Chrome Version 67.0.3396.99 (Official Build) (64-bit)
data.actual_result: Cursor will disappear until you click to play video again
data.expected_result: Should be able to see cursor to access video controls
data.short_description: When watching an embedded .MP4 file fullscreen, if you watch long enough for the control bar to go away then you pause video by clicking on it, you won't be able to see cursor anymore. So if you want to minimize from full screen you have to start video again for cursor to come back.
data.steps_to_repro: - Watch embedded  file - Make Fullscreen - pause video by clicking -
